attributes.action: Easing visas for Europe or coming back to EU
attributes.additional_details: Without Europe coming in, the rental market is very down and it is difficult for the london rental market
attributes.background:
Promoting any workers (not skilled onlly) so people can come to do a working experience even for hospitality or whatever
This will bring the economy up again for many sectors

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
